name: Utokia's Ginger Shrimp and Broccoli with Garlic
author: Reynolds Kitchens(R)
summary: Parchment packets filled with shrimp and broccoli florets and seasoned with an Asian-inspired ginger sauce are baked for a delicious and easy-clean-up dinner.
ingredients: 1 pound raw shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: Tear off four 15-inch sheets of Reynolds Parchment Paper
Fold each sheet in half and crease it in the center
Cut each into a heart shape; unfold
Divide broccoli and shrimp evenly on one-half of each sheet near crease
Mix garlic, sesame oil, ginger and soy sauce
Spoon 1/4 the mixture evenly over broccoli and shrimp on each sheet
Fold over other half of each sheet to enclose ingredients
Starting at top, make small overlapping folds down entire length of parchment to secure edges together
Twist last fold several times to make a tight seal
Place parchment packets on a large baking sheet with 1-inch sides
Bake 13 to 15 minutes or until shrimp is done
Place parchment packets on dinner plates
Carefully cut an X in the top of each packet; open carefully, allowing steam to escape
